001package tictactoe.console;
002
003/**
004 * Contains the one character commands used in the console Tic-Tac-Toe.
005 * 
006 * @author Tapio Malmberg
007 */
008class Commands {
009    /**
010     * The command for changing the settings.
011     */
012    public static final char CHANGE_SETTINGS = 'c';
013
014    /**
015     * The command for quitting the game.
016     */
017    public static final char QUIT = 'q';
018
019    /**
020     * The command for resetting the game.
021     */
022    public static final char RESET = 'r';
023
024    /**
025     * The command for undoing the previous move.
026     */
027    public static final char UNDO = 'u';
028}
